problems.title: Insert Multiple Nodes in AVL Tree and Print Preorder Traversal
problems.description:
Problem Statement

You are given N integers. Insert all values one by one into an AVL Tree (self-balancing BST).
After all insertions, print the Preorder Traversal of the AVL Tree.

AVL Tree Rules:
- Height-balanced BST.
- Balance Factor = height(left) − height(right).
- If BF becomes ±2, perform required rotations:
  * LL Rotation
  * RR Rotation
  * LR Rotation
  * RL Rotation

Preorder Traversal:
Root → Left → Right

Input Format
The first line contains integer N.
The second line contains N space-separated integers.

Output Format
Print preorder traversal as space-separated values.
If the tree is empty, print "Tree is Empty".

Example
Input:
5
30 20 40 10 25

Output:
30 20 10 25 40

Explanation:
Values inserted with AVL balancing, then preorder printed.
problems.examples:
Sample Input 1
5
30 20 40 10 25

Sample Output 1
30 20 10 25 40

Sample Input 2
3
10 20 30

Sample Output 2
20 10 30
